channel.title: Item given once
channel.description: I'm trying to create a sort of hidden finds system into my server such as if a player finds one of my hidden npcs or an object, when they click it, they get a prize of an item or money, now i have everything worked out apart from how i can store the information that says the player either has or hasn't already collected the prize, otherwise they could just click away merrily and get as much of the prize as they want. I was thinking about adding something to their character files or moreinfo files but I'm not going to try unless i get some advice first on how i could do it because iv never changed how the stored information works so id probably screw it up, anybody know how i can do this? thanks.

item.title: Item given once
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

There’s no other way than storing the information somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Item given once
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

I’m trying to create a sort of hidden finds system into my server such as if a player finds one of my hidden npcs or an object, when they click it, they get a prize of an item or money, now i have everything worked out apart from how i can store the information that says the player either has or hasn’t already collected the prize, otherwise they could just click away merrily and get as much of the prize as they want. I was thinking about adding something to their character files or moreinfo files but I’m not going to try unless i get some advice first on how i could do it because iv never changed how the stored information works so id probably screw it up, anybody know how i can do this? thanks.
